original_text: And the territory of the Canaanites extended from Sidon in the direction of Gerar as far as Gaza, and in the direction of Sodom, Gomorrah, Admah, and Zeboiim, as far as Lasha.
korean_text: 가나안의 경계는 시돈에서부터 그랄을 지나 가사까지와 소돔과 고모라와 아드마와 스보임을 지나 라사까지였더라

sentences.original_text: And the territory of the Canaanites extended
from Sidon in the direction of Gerar
and in the direction of Sodom, Gomorrah, Admah, and Zeboiim
